mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(IF(notice_type = 1 OR notice_type = 2, 1, NULL)) commentCount, COUNT(IF(notice_type = 3, 1, NULL)) likeCount, COUNT(IF(notice_type = 4, 1, NULL)) newFollowCount, COUNT(IF(notice_type = 0, 1, NULL)) systemMsgCount FROM s_notices WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND read_status = 0

SELECT sn.uid, sn.notice_type noticeType, sn.action_user_id actionUserId, sn.read_status readStatus, sn.target_id targetId, sc.target_type targetType, sn.create_time createTime, sn.uid commentId, IF(sc.content_img_url IS NULL, sc.content, CONCAT( sc.content, '[图片]' )) commentContent, sn.reply_id replyId FROM s_notices sn INNER JOIN s_comment sc ON sn.uid = sc.uid WHERE sn.user_id = #{userId} AND sn.notice_type = 1 ORDER BY sn.create_time DESC LIMIT #{data.offset}, #{data.limit}

SELECT sn.uid, sn.notice_type noticeType, sn.action_user_id actionUserId, sn.read_status readStatus, sli.target_id targetId, sli.target_type targetType, sn.create_time createTime FROM s_notices sn INNER JOIN s_like_item sli ON sn.uid = sli.uid WHERE sn.user_id = #{userId} AND sn.notice_type = 3 ORDER BY sn.create_time DESC LIMIT #{data.offset}, #{data.limit}
